name: American Addiction Centers
overview:
I absolutely love what we do here. As Chairman of American Addiction Centers, I take personal pride in the progress of each person we help to recover. It’s an incredible honor to lead an amazing team of professionals who help those in need break free from the heavy chains of addiction each day.

In my almost 20 years of professional behavioral and behavioral health experience, I have participated in 15 federally funded research studies on dual diagnosis and addiction, and have helped tens of thousands of people find their way to recovery. I have combined my practices and what I have learned into a treatment philosophy based on 5 essential elements woven into everything we do at American Addiction Centers. By applying these elements, any individual can beat any addiction.

Our clinical staff, medical specialists and executive teams are caring, seasoned experts who understand the importance of integrated treatment programs customized to an individual’s mind, body and soul. From initial assessments to aftercare treatment, all of our facilities offer nurturing environments that foster successful recovery.

Discover our site, discover our company and discover how you can find your believable hope.

Sincerely,
